kw.name: Open Tagesspiegel Application
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the specified keyword and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Unselect Frame
kw.doc: Sets the main frame as the current frame.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Does Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` disappears from the current page.
This keyword opens the Tagesspiegel application in a web browser and maximizes the window. It also accepts cookies if the banner is present.

kw.name: Log

kw.name: Go To

kw.name: Verify Password Set Page Is Open
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the user is on the password set page by checking the presence of the header "Passwort vergeben".

kw.name: Fill New Password Form
kw.doc: This keyword fills the new password form with a generated password and confirms it.

kw.name: Click On Submit Button By Accepting Permissions
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the submit button to set the new password.
